Class
Description
Baron
Strength: 3 AmountInDeck: 2 Effects: Player may choose another player and privately compare hands.
Cards
 
ChatMessage
This is the Class for storing Messages created by a User.
ChatMessageDisplayItem
 
ChatMessageTypeAdapter
 
ChatModel
 
ChatView
 
ChatViewModel
 
ChatViewTest
 
Client
 
ClientList
The ClientList is used by the Server and ServerThread to keep track of the authenticated users, and store their Socket connections to do server.
ClientReaderThread
This is the Thread that receives all messages from the Server and handles them as needed.
ClientStarter
 
ClientWriterThread
This is the Thread that sends all the messages from the Client to the Server.
Command
This class parses the commands given by the Users in the Chat GUI.
Command.CommandType
 
Command.GameCommandType
 
Countess
Strength: 7 AmountInDeck: 1 Effects:If the player holds this card and either the King or the Prince, this card must be played immediately, which otherwise does nothing.
Deck
This class is used for initializing and shuffling the deck.
Envelope
Envelope is used for Client-Server communication, by convention whenever we exchange data betweeen Client and Server it must be wrapped by the sender in an Envelope and turned to JSON, and it must be deserialized from JSON by the receiver and then unwrapped.
Envelope.EnvelopeType
TypeEnum is used to store the original type of the payload of the Envelope which is necessary to know in order to unwrap the Envelope and get the payload back.
EnvelopeSerializable
 
EnvelopeTypeAdapter
 
Game
The Game class provides an API to the Server for starting, and controlling the Game and also handles possible errors and invalid commands given by the Users.
GameAction
The Game receives the #discard commands of Players parsed as GameAction objects.
GameEvent
GameEvents are Notifications and Errors generated by Game and forwarded to Server.
GameEvent.GameEventType
 
Guard
Strength: 1 AmountInDeck: 5 Effects: Player may choose another player and name a card other than Guard.
Handmaid
Strength: 4 AmountInDeck: 2 Effects: If the Player discards Handmaid they will be immune until the beginning of their next turn and cannot be targeted by other Players.
King
Strength: 6 AmountInDeck: 1 Effects: Player may trade hands with another player.
LoginModel
 
LoginRequest
 
LoginRequestTypeAdapter
 
LoginView
 
LoginViewModel
 
NetworkConnection
This is a Singleton, a central storage location for the Network Connection information required by several classes on the Client Side.
Player
Player extends class User.
PlayerQueue
 
Priest
Strength: 2 AmountInDeck: 2 Player may privately see another player's hand.
Prince
Strength: 5 AmountInDeck: 2 Effect: Player can target another Player who has to discard their current card and draw a new one from the deck.
Princess
Strength: 8 AmountInDeck: 1 If the player plays or discards this card for any reason, they are eliminated from the round.
Server
This is the primary Server Thread, it handles the logging in of new Users and upon successful registers the user.
ServerEvent
This is the Class which determines the format for notifying Users of UserEvents (and eventually all Events) which are currently Login and Logout Events.
ServerEvent.ServerEventType
It is used to store the type of Event that happened.
ServerEventTypeAdapter
 
ServerThread
This is the Thread started for each user, it waits for messages from its corresponding user and then forwards the received messages to all the other logged-in Users.
User
 
UserTypeAdapter
